1.title: Chuck and the Palm Trees
1.plot: Chuck finds cleaner fuel for Mr. Farmer's tractor.

2.title: Chuck and the Farm
2.plot: There are problems on the Farm for Chuck to sort out with his friends. Mrs Farmer is so grateful she bakes Doodle's favorite - apple pie with ice-cream and a big strawberry on top!

3.title: Chuck and the Penguins
3.plot: Chuck and Doodle fly away in the balloon tub and, with Bert's help, save starving penguins in a foreign land. As a reward they are given a gold medal and silver stars by the Mayor.

4.title: Chuck and the Kite
4.plot: Chuck and Doodle travel on their 'windboard' to a forest. They help Molly teach her class about the importance of trees and how to make paper kites from litter. Later on, they enjoy flying the kites in the fields.

5.title: Chuck and the Farm Pond
5.plot: Chuck and Essie compete in a big dance competition, but have to return to the Farm where water is running out. Chuck finds a way to save water for Mr. Farmer and sends Doodle off to get Scary Scarecrow home again.

6.title: Chuck and the Good Food
6.plot: Molly is rescued in the air by fatty 'Chips' the seagull. Chuck has a big idea, so the farm animals and birds march to the seaside town to show everyone, including Chips, what good food is like.

7.title: Chuck and the Snow Goose
7.plot: Chuck and Doodle discover that the two-legged sheep is really a snow goose. They all fly off with Bert and the Girly Birds in the balloon tub to help her distant land get better again.

8.title: Chuck and the Football Team
8.plot: Chuck's team, the Waddlers, are not very fit. He takes them to the big city club, the Wanderers, where they learn that regular exercise can be fun and this helps them to win their next match.

9.title: Chuck and the New Barn
9.plot: The Farm's big barn is blown down and Doodle is blown away! So Chuck and Essie get the Farm animals and birds to rebuild it and Doodle discovers a green garden roof, which they copy for the new barn.

10.title: Chuck and the Holiday
10.plot: Chuck, with Ducktor Dad and his best friends, go for a holiday. They rescue Bert and other wildlife mistakenly eating plastic rubbish on the beach. Then, on the last day, they all dance around Doodle's big sandcastle.

11.title: Chuck and the Sparkling Water
11.plot: The Farm's Swimming Championship Day is canceled due to dirty farm pond and river water. Chuck, with Essie's help, finds a solution, so that Denver can at last swim in lots of races.

12.title: Chuck and the Clear Blue Sky
12.plot: The smoggy air from the big city is making all the farm animals poorly. So Chuck, followed by the nervy flyer Molly, go to the city and start a campaign with children for cleaner air. Soon they can all go happily jogging again.

13.title: Chuck and the Dolphins
13.plot: Chuck and Doodle sail away to help dolphins find food in their home waters. They get shipwrecked and chased by bad tempered monkeys, but find a solution with fishermen for the fishy shortage.

14.title: Chuck and the Christmas Party
14.plot: Just before Christmas there is lots of snow for the farm animals and birds to play in. Everyone forgets to buy Christmas gifts, but Chuck has lots of ideas. So the clever duck is given a surprise Christmas party.

imdb.title: Chuck the Eco Duck
plot: The continuing adventures of a conscientious duck and his efforts to help the Farm he lives on and all his animal friends.::Anonymous
